languages.text: "Остановитесь, {name}. Арбитес выполняли приказы Стракса, следуя уставу. Судить их только за это — несправедливо. Проявите к ним снисхождение, что однажды показали мне, иначе весь путь, что мы прошли вместе, был напрасным".
languages.translation_comment:
Каунтер Соломона Схизматик.
Если нет романса

Каунтер Соломона Схизматик.
Если нет романса

languages.text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."
languages.original_text: "Остановитесь, {name}. Арбитес выполняли приказы Стракса, следуя уставу. Судить их только за это — несправедливо. Проявите к ним снисхождение, что однажды показали мне, иначе весь путь, что мы прошли вместе, был напрасным".

traits.locale_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

"Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

"Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

"Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

"Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

languages.text: "Halt, {name}. Die Arbites haben Strachs Befehle und damit das Gesetz befolgt. Ihnen das vorzuwerfen, ist nicht fair. Begegnet ihnen mit der Milde, mit der Ihr einst mir begegnet seid, sonst war unsere gemeinsame Reise völlig umsonst."
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Halt, {name}. Die Arbites haben Strachs Befehle und damit das Gesetz befolgt. Ihnen das vorzuwerfen, ist nicht fair. Begegnet ihnen mit der Milde, mit der Ihr einst mir begegnet seid, sonst war unsere gemeinsame Reise völlig umsonst."

languages.text: « Un instant, {name}. Les membres de l'Arbites obéissaient aux ordres de Strachs, conformément à la loi. Les condamner pour cette seule raison serait injuste. Témoignez-leur la même indulgence dont vous avez fait preuve à mon égard, ou le long chemin que nous avons parcouru ensemble aura été en pure perte. »
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Un instant, {name}. Les membres de l'Arbites obéissaient aux ordres de Strachs, conformément à la loi. Les condamner pour cette seule raison serait injuste. Témoignez-leur la même indulgence dont vous avez fait preuve à mon égard, ou le long chemin que nous avons parcouru ensemble aura été en pure perte. »

languages.text: “住手，{name}。那些法务官仅仅是在执行斯塔克斯的命令，履行律法的职责。如果仅仅因为这点就判处他们死刑，那就太不公平了。让他们看到你的宽容吧，就像你曾经宽容我那样，否则我们一起走过的漫长道路就失去意义了。”
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: “住手，{name}。那些法务官仅仅是在执行斯塔克斯的命令，履行律法的职责。如果仅仅因为这点就判处他们死刑，那就太不公平了。让他们看到你的宽容吧，就像你曾经宽容我那样，否则我们一起走过的漫长道路就失去意义了。”

languages.text: «Alto, {name}. El Arbites seguía las órdenes de Strachs y la ley. Condenarles por eso es injusto. Muéstrales la misma indulgencia que me concediste a mí o el largo camino que hemos recorrido juntos habrá sido en vano».
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Alto, {name}. El Arbites seguía las órdenes de Strachs y la ley. Condenarles por eso es injusto. Muéstrales la misma indulgencia que me concediste a mí o el largo camino que hemos recorrido juntos habrá sido en vano».

languages.text: 「{name}、やめてください。高等裁定局はストラッチスの命令に従い、法に則って行動していただけです。そのことで彼らを非難するのは不公平です。かつて私に示してくださった寛容さを彼らにも示してください。さもなければ、私たちが共に歩んできた長い道のりが無駄になってしまいます」
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、やめてください。高等裁定局はストラッチスの命令に従い、法に則って行動していただけです。そのことで彼らを非難するのは不公平です。かつて私に示してくださった寛容さを彼らにも示してください。さもなければ、私たちが共に歩んできた長い道のりが無駄になってしまいます」

languages.text: "Olmaz {name}. Arbites mensupları yalnızca Strachs'ın emirlerine, yasaya itaat etti. Onları sırf bu yüzden cezalandırmak adil değil. Vaktiyle bana gösterdiğiniz müsamahayı onlara da gösterin. Bunca yolu bir hiç uğruna beraber tepmiş olmayalım."
languages.original_text: "Stop, {name}. The Arbites were following Strachs's orders, following the law. To condemn them just for that is unfair. Show them the leniency that you once showed me, or else this long road we have travelled together will have been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Yapmayın {name}. Arbites mensupları yalnızca Strachs'ın emirlerine, yasaya itaat etti. Onları sırf bu yüzden cezalandırmak adil olmaz. Vaktiyle bana gösterdiğiniz müsamahayı onlara da gösterin. Bunca yolu bir hiç uğruna beraber tepmiş olmayalım."
